name: create_event
attributes: # [doc = " イベント作成：ID・説明を受け取り、参加者数を０で初期化"]
body: * ctx . accounts . event = Event { owner : ctx . accounts . organizer . key () , bump , event_id , description , participant_count : 0 , } ;

name: rsvp
attributes: # [doc = " 参加者登録：参加カウントをインクリメント"]
body: let ev = & mut ctx . accounts . event ;

name: cancel_rsvp
attributes: # [doc = " 参加キャンセル：参加カウントをデクリメント"]
body: let ev = & mut ctx . accounts . event ;

fields.name: event
fields.attribute: # [doc = " PDA で生成する Event アカウント"] # [account (init , payer = organizer , space = 8 + 32 + 1 + 8 + 4 + 200 + 8 , seeds = [b"event" , organizer . key () . as_ref () , & event_id . to_le_bytes ()] , bump)]

fields.name: organizer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " イベント主催者（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: event
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 既存の Event（PDA／bump 検証のみ、オーナー以外も操作可）"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"event" , event . owner . as_ref () , & event . event_id . to_le_bytes ()] , bump = event . bump)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 参加／キャンセルを実行するユーザー（署名必須）"] # [account (signer)]
